articles.author: Elizabeth Dwoskin, Nitasha Tiku
articles.title: Musk and Trump are over. Silicon Valley is just getting started. - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Tech-Trump alliance has always had tensions. But its lucrative nature has outweighed the ideological differences.
articles.content:
It would have been another banner day for Silicon Valleys blossoming alliance with Washington if only President Donald Trump and Elon Musk hadnt been attacking each other online.

articles.title: How to watch Apple’s WWDC 2025 keynote - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple is expected to unveil changes to its operating systems iOS, iPadOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and visionOS at its Worldwide Developers Conference.
articles.content:
Apple is hosting its 2025 Worldwide Developers Conference starting Monday, with the keynote scheduled for Monday at 10 a.m. PT / 1 p.m. ET.
